result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Melissa K. Ottum
Current: 401E E Menomonie St, Elk Mound, WI 54739 United States  (Effective: 08-29-2022)

(Cases 21CM585, 22CF77, 22CF143, 22CF586, 22CF663 are called at 10:10 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Melissa K. Ottum in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video for Melissa K. Ottum.  Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas in 22CF77, 22CF143. Court receives Not Guilty pleas in 22CF77, 22CF143. 
Branch 1 Judicial Assistant for further scheduling- all other cases to ride along.

Cases re-called at 11:45 AM: 21CM585, 22CF77, 22CF143, 22CF586, 22CF663.
Defendant Melissa K. Ottum in court without Attorney Fran Rivard.  Attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Warrants quashed/.will not be signed. 22CF663: Defendant waives reading of Complaints.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 7/27/22 at 2:45 PM.
RTN: 8/29/22 at 9:30 AM.

10:35 AM cases 22CF77, 22CF143, 22CF663, 22CF586,21CM585 called. Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Melissa K. Ottum not in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Melissa K. Ottum. 
State requests a warrant- So ordered but stayed until Friday at noon.
Letter to defendant with amended cash bond ordered by court 06/07/2022. Request to return signed bond and Affidavit of Witness form to Clerk of Court no later than 06/17/2022.

Conditions:
No contact with S.O., A.G. or their residences.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.

State's Order to Modify Bond
It is hereby ordered: Conditions of the bond imposed in 22CF586 shall be modified to read "no contact with SO."
State's Proposed Order to Modify Bond

Conditions:
No contact with O.S., A.G. or their residences.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.

(11:12 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Melissa K. Ottum appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by video for Melissa K. Ottum. 
Defendant waives formal reading of the complaint and time limits for preliminary hearing.
State requests $750.00 cash bond and cites reasoning. Attorney Anderson requests signature bond and cites reasoning.
Court orders $150.00 cash bond with conditions.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on June 20, 2022 at 2:45 pm.
Hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
No contact with O.S., A.G. or their residences.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.
